name: Social Media Icons
description:
⭐️Social Media icons that you can use for your projects! ⭐️

💫Comes with 10 pixel art icons with an alternative text header version💫

🔧Use for Twitch about me sections, Youtube thumnbails, Video Games or anything else you want🔧

❌Can not be resold as art assets❌

Currently includes discord, facebook, instagram, pinterest, reddit,  spotify, steam, twitch, twitter and youtube
